About this interactive

Data from 2015 - current. Last updated 05/14/16.


Baltimore data is sourced from Open Baltimore and specifically includes victim-based reports on shootings.


Maryland-wide data is sourced from Gun Violence Archive and includes incidents in which a gun was fired under various circumstances, including non-criminal causes.


Inspired by The Trace
